name: DANDI Archive
description: A public archive of neurophysiology datasets, including raw and processed data, and associated software containers. Datasets are shared according to Creative Commons CC0 or CC-BY licenses. The data archive provides a broad range of cellular neurophysiology data, including electrode and optical recordings, and associated imaging data using community standards: NWB:N, BIDS, and NIDM.
owner_name: DANDI (Distributed Archives for Neurophysiology Data Integration)
